params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.entry
params.description: Required. Updates for the entry. The name field must be set.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Names of fields whose values to overwrite on an entry. If this parameter is absent or empty, all modifiable fields are overwritten. If such fields are non-required and omitted in the request body, their values are emptied. You can modify only the fields listed below. For entries with type DATA_STREAM: schema For entries with type FILESET: schema display_name description gcs_fileset_spec gcs_fileset_spec.file_patterns For entries with user_specified_type: schema display_name description user_specified_type user_specified_system linked_resource * source_system_timestamps

params.name: var
params.description: Required. Updates for the entry. The name field must be set.

methods.name: getUpdateMask
methods.description:
Names of fields whose values to overwrite on an entry.

If this parameter is absent or empty, all modifiable fields are overwritten. If such fields are non-required and omitted in the request body, their values are emptied. You can modify only the fields listed below. For entries with type DATA_STREAM:

  • schema For entries with type FILESET:
  • schema
  • display_name
  • description
  • gcs_fileset_spec
  • gcs_fileset_spec.file_patterns For entries with user_specified_type:
  • schema
  • display_name
  • description
  • user_specified_type
  • user_specified_system
  • linked_resource
  • source_system_timestamps

Generated from protobuf field .google.protobuf.FieldMask update_mask = 2;
